channel.title: Typing '/'
channel.description: when i use forward slashes instead of appearing as spaces to other's they change the other characters around it. 'lol/lol' becomes 'lol utol' I think it has something to do with the censor pre-added to stop spamming or something along those lines? any help would be appreciated. I'm thinking it's client sided as well, source is deathlypvpz v4

item.title: Typing '/'
item.dc:creator: @loganownsyou loganownsyou
item.description:
@loganownsyou wrote:

wow, sorry i’m dumb i was looking in the server for textinput. I found it in the client, however ‘/’ seems to be an already valid character? there’s another textclass class, where ‘/’ isn’t a valid character, but i think that’s for the usernames because it has a-z 0-9 and underscores (_). What would i be looking for?

Read full topic
